means: 无法与外界交流的，单独监禁的

sentence.Network_en: Yesterday she was incommunicado, putting the finishing touches to her autobiography.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天她闭门独处，对她的自传作最后的润色。

sentence.Network_en: He is incommunicado in a secluded cottage in Wales.
sentence.Network_cn: 他隐居在威尔士一个偏僻的小村舍里。

sentence.Network_en: The prisoner has been held incommunicado for more than a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 这名囚犯已被单独囚禁了一个多星期。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... ado 忙乱，骚扰 incommunicado 被单独监禁的 aficionado 爱好者.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _... ... incommunicable 不能传达的 incommunicado 禁止通信的 incommunicative 不爱说话的.
...，特别是通知其家人。而不是事主对外失去联络(incommunicado)多天后，才经由非司法程序指其违法，甚至风传事主妻子「控诉」 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Spanish incomunicado, past participle of incomunicar 'deprive of communication'

entry.tran: 不得与外界接触的;被单独监禁的
entry.def: If someone is being kept incommunicado, they are not allowed to talk to anyone outside the place where they are.

example.ex: He was held incommunicado in prison for ten days before being released without charge.
example.tran: 在被无指控释放以前,他在狱中被单独监禁了 10 天。

entry.tran: 隐逸的;闭门独处的;不愿受打扰的
entry.def: If someone is incommunicado, they do not want to be disturbed, or are in a place where they cannot be contacted.

example.ex: Yesterday she was incommunicado, putting the finishing touches to her autobiography...
example.tran: 昨天她闭门独处,对她的自传作最后的润色。

example.ex: He is incommunicado in a secluded cottage in Wales.
example.tran: 他隐居在威尔士一个偏僻的小村舍里。

means.word_mean: 1. without the means or right to communicate;

auth_sentence.content: He would be incommunicado for a year at least.
auth_sentence.res_content: He would be incommunicado for a year at least.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He would be incommunicado for a year at least.

auth_sentence.content: Incommunicado Cell phone communications are cut to Kidal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Incommunicado Cell phone communications are cut to Kidal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Incommunicado Cell phone communications are cut to Kidal.

auth_sentence.content: You may be held incommunicado and spend months without receiving messages from your family.
auth_sentence.res_content: You may be held incommunicado and spend months without receiving messages from your family.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You may be held incommunicado and spend months without receiving messages from your family.
